word:
A word more: do not speak a word in jest that shall injure or reflect upon the other. Never recount the mistakes, or errors, or faults of each other in the presence of a third person, or in company, be the circle ever so select. Live for God and for each other.--Letter 16a, 1870 (To Edson and Emma White, October, 1870.) 

Released December 2, 1974.
